v8:item.v8:content: The wizard is designed for monthly calculation and recording in operation accounting: depreciation accrual, direct cost calculation, cost allocation, actual cost calculation, financial performance calculation, exchange rate difference calculation and cost calculation
Make sure that each sales invoice is included into corresponding tax invoice
"Accrue depreciation". If the company has fixed assets, you should accrue depreciation every month.
"Calculate direct costs". To define indirect costs base, calculate direct costs first.
"Allocate costs". Allocation of indirect and direct costs which have allocation base.
"Calculate actual cost". Cost calculation considering allocation of indirect and direct costs.
If there is retail with value accounting in the company, calculate cost in it.
"Calculate exchange rate differences". Calculation of exchange rate differences on changing exchange rates.
"Calculate financial result". Allocation of costs and expenses to financial result according to a determined allocation base.
Month-end closing is not required as there is no data for calculation.
Do not close the form as the month is being closed. It may take a long time to perform this operation.
Month end is executed. This operation may take a while.
Make sure that each sales invoice is included into corresponding tax invoice
